TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ComConversionLossAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Indicates that information was lost about a class or interface when it was imported from a type library to an assembly.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) applies this attribute to classes or interfaces.
Methods that use `void` pointer arguments cause this attribute to be applied to the containing class or interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
